item.title: 更多俄罗斯保险公司寻求印度批准承保油轮
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，四家新成立的俄罗斯公司已寻求印度批准为停靠在南亚国家港口的原油油轮提供保险。【原文：Four new Russian companies have sought India’s approval to provide insurance for crude oil tankers docking at ports in the South Asian nation, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储哈马克称明确数据可能促使 6 月利率上调
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）排除了 5 月份降息的可能性，但表示，如果有明确的证据表明经济走向，央行最早可能在 6 月份采取行动。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack ruled out a May interest-rate cut but said the central bank could move as early as June if it has clear evidence of the economy’s direction.】

item.title: 在政府专家组裁员之际，华盛顿特区失去穆迪的 Aaa 信用评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周三下调了哥伦比亚特区的评级，在特朗普政府继续削减联邦工作岗位的情况下，哥伦比亚特区失去了Aaa信用评级。【原文：Moody’s Ratings downgraded the District of Columbia on Wednesday, causing the nation’s capital to lose its Aaa credit rating as the Trump administration continues to slash federal jobs.】

item.title: 土耳其黄金合约大幅溢价交易，买家蜂拥而至
item.description: 土耳其新一波黄金狂热者正在推动实物金属价格与追踪实物金属的较新数字工具价格之间的差距不断扩大。【原文：A new wave of Turkish gold bugs is driving a widening gap between the price of the physical metal — a long-time investing favorite in the country — and newer digital instruments that track it.】

item.title: 尽管与美国关系出现裂痕，西班牙国家队仍捍卫与中国的关系
item.description: 西班牙经济部长卡洛斯-奎尔波（Carlos Cuerpo）在华盛顿与中国政府关系日益紧张的情况下，为西班牙与中国的外联活动进行了辩护，认为欧洲需要成为全球新秩序中的关键角色。【原文：Spanish Economy Minister Carlos Cuerpo defended his country’s outreach to China in the face of increasing tensions between Washington and Beijing, arguing that Europe needs to be a key player in a new global order.】

item.title: 富兰克林首席执行官称部分机构投资者正在抛弃美股
item.description: 富兰克林资源公司（Franklin Resources Inc.首席执行官珍妮-约翰逊（Jenny Johnson）说，唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策正导致一些大型外国投资者将资金从美国市场转移。【原文：Franklin Resources Inc. Chief Executive Officer Jenny Johnson said President Donald Trump’s tariffs are leading some large foreign investors to shift their money away from US markets.】

item.title: 深空经济从月球开始
item.description:
在本期Primer节目中，包括美国阿尔忒弥斯号宇航员在内的专家将解释为什么人类重返月球是更大飞跃的开始。【原文：

On this episode of Primer, experts including America’s Artemis astronauts explain why humanity’s return to the moon is the start of a bigger leap.

】

item.title: Axis 银行将通过债务和股权融资 64 亿美元
item.description: 安信银行（Axis Bank Ltd）计划通过出售股票筹集 2,000 亿卢比（23 亿美元），作为包括债务在内的更大规模资本筹集的一部分。【原文：Axis Bank Ltd plans to raise 200 billion rupees ($2.3 billion) through a share sale as part of a bigger capital raise that includes debt.】

item.title: 中国在东南亚的投资阻碍了美国的供应链计划
item.description: 中国对东南亚制造业的投资可能比官方数据显示的要高得多，这凸显了美国试图将中国政府拒之门外或将中国制造的商品排除在供应链之外的难度。【原文：Chinese investments in Southeast Asian manufacturing are likely much higher than official data shows, underscoring the difficulty of any US attempt to box in Beijing or exclude Chinese-made goods from its supply chains.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利将出售与收购相关的最后 12.3 亿美元 X 债务
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，摩根士丹利已开始出售与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）2022 年收购社交媒体平台 X 公司有关的价值 12.3 亿美元的最后一笔债务，这标志着长达数年的向投资者出售债务的过程迈出了最后一步。【原文：Morgan Stanley has launched a sale of the last $1.23 billion worth of X Corp. debt tied to Elon Musk’s buyout of the social media platform in 2022, according to a person familiar with the matter, marking the final step of a years-long process to offload the debt to investors.】

item.title: 美国初请失业金人数略有上升，与预测相符
item.description: 美国失业救济金申请人数略有上升，反映出劳动力市场稳定。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits picked up slightly, reflecting a stable labor market.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉将向堡垒策略公司投资 10 亿美元
item.description: 阿布扎比主权财富基金穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Company）周四表示，同意向由堡垒投资集团（Fortress Investment Group）管理的私人信贷和其他策略投资 10 亿美元。【原文：Mubadala Investment Company, an Abu Dhabi sovereign wealth fund, agreed to invest $1 billion in private credit and other strategies managed by Fortress Investment Group, the investors said on Thursday.】

item.title: 塞尔希斯投资者敦促严惩创始人马辛斯基
item.description: 在承认与 2022 年公司倒闭有关的欺诈行为后，失败的加密贷款公司 Celsius Network 的众多心怀不满的投资者敦促联邦法官在下个月对创始人亚历克斯-马辛斯基（Alex Mashinsky）进行处罚时，将其绳之以法。【原文：A slew of disgruntled investors in the failed crypto lender Celsius Network urged a federal judge to throw the book at founder Alex Mashinsky when he is punished next month after admitting to fraud in connection with the 2022 collapse of the company.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长莱恩预计贸易后果不会引发经济衰退
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩表示，贸易紧张局势不太可能导致欧元区经济衰退。【原文：European Central Bank Chief Economist Philip Lane said trade tensions are unlikely to result in a recession for the euro zone.】

item.description:

item.title: 迪拜烟壶制造商利用技术为全球烟民带来水烟
item.description: 这位研究员身着白大褂，在笔记本电脑上做着记录，他又吸了一口水烟。他聚精会神地分析烟云的香气和结构，就像品酒师分析葡萄酒一样。【原文：Dressed in a white lab coat and taking notes on a laptop, the researcher takes another puff from his hookah. Concentrating deeply, he analyzes the smoke cloud’s aroma and structure like a sommelier would do with wine.】

item.title: 欧盟认为与肯尼亚的贸易将因《经济伙伴关系协定》而翻番
item.description: 在与肯尼亚签署了一项经济伙伴关系协议，给予这个非洲国家免关税、免配额进入欧盟的权利之后，欧盟希望与肯尼亚的贸易额翻番。【原文：The European Union wants to double trade with Kenya after signing an economic partnership agreement granting the African nation duty-free and quota-free access to the bloc.】

item.title: 巴利亚斯尼聘用科达伊公司创始人，该公司曾退还客户现金
item.description: 在股票交易对冲基金 Kodai Capital Management 决定向包括最初支持者千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）在内的投资者返还资本后，该公司的一位创始人将加入 Balyasny Asset Management。【原文：A founder of stock-trading hedge fund Kodai Capital Management is joining Balyasny Asset Management after his firm decided to return capital to investors, including initial backer Millennium Management.】

item.title: 墨西哥通胀率因墨西哥银行降息而意外上升
item.description: 在决策者下月召开利率会议之前，墨西哥的年度通胀率在 4 月份的前两周意外上升，但仍保持在央行的目标范围内。【原文：Mexico’s annual inflation unexpectedly ticked up in the first two weeks of April while remaining within the central bank’s target range ahead of policymakers’ interest rate meeting next month.】

item.title: 陶氏在波动中推迟加拿大大型项目建设
item.description: 陶氏公司（Dow Inc. ）表示，将推迟在加拿大的一个大型化工项目的建设，直到市场条件有所改善，并将该美国公司今年的资本支出计划削减了 10 亿美元。【原文：Dow Inc. said it’s delaying construction at a major chemicals project in Canada until market conditions improve, cutting the US company’s capital spending plan for the year by $1 billion.】

item.title: 优步与大众汽车合作，明年部署自动驾驶 ID Buzz 面包车
item.description: 优步技术公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. and Volkswagen AG have partnered to deploy thousands of electric ID Buzz vans in the US, marking the latest partnership to expand autonomous options on the ride hailing app.】

item.title: 莫桑比克煤矿因价格下滑而裁员数百人
item.description: 莫桑比克的煤矿包括该国最大的煤矿正在裁员，原因是选举后发生了暴力事件，以及该国最大的出口产品价格暴跌。【原文：Mozambique’s coal mines including the country’s largest operation are laying off hundreds of workers following post-electoral violence and a slump in the price of the nation’s biggest export.】

item.title: 南非央行行长称油价下跌将缓和 CPI
item.description: 南非央行行长莱塞特贾-克加亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）表示，油价下跌已帮助将该国的通胀率推至多年来的低点，而且很可能会继续如此。【原文：South Africa’s central bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago said that lower oil prices have helped drive inflation in the country to a multiyear low and would probably continue to do so.】

item.title: 上海车展让人看到没有化石燃料的未来
item.description:
中国作为全球石油需求增长支柱的作用即将结束，因为中国将继续快速发展电动汽车。【原文：

China’s role as the lynchpin of global oil demand growth is coming to an end as its embrace of electric vehicles continues apace.

】

item.title: 俄罗斯燃料出口稳步增长，石脑油缓解柴油下滑压力
item.description: 由于石脑油销售的增长帮助抵消了柴油流量的下降，本月俄罗斯石油产品出口略有增长。【原文：Russian oil product exports edged higher this month as a boost in naphtha sales helped offset a decline in diesel flows.】

item.title: 特朗普关税令欧洲集团疏远，习近平寻求与欧洲缓和关系
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）因关税和国防等问题疏远欧盟之际，中国国家主席习近平正在寻求修复与欧盟的关系，将中国描绘成更可靠的合作伙伴。【原文：President Xi Jinping is seeking to repair ties with the European Union, painting China as the more reliable partner as Donald Trump alienates the bloc over issues from tariffs to defense.】

item.title: 日本抵制特朗普针对中国组建贸易集团的努力
item.description: 据现任和前任日本政府官员称，由于东京与北京贸易关系的重要性，日本打算反击美国将其纳入一个与中国结盟的经济集团的任何努力。【原文：Japan intends to push back against any US effort to bring it into an economic bloc aligned against China because of the importance of Tokyo’s trade ties with Beijing, according to current and former Japanese government officials.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为美联储减息为国债带来 "巨大 "机遇
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）称，美国国债比欧洲国债更有上涨潜力，因为与欧洲央行相比，交易商对美联储的降息幅度定价过低。【原文：JPMorgan Asset Management says US Treasuries have more potential for gains than European government bonds because traders are underpricing the extent to which the Federal Reserve will reduce interest rates compared with the European Central Bank.】

item.title: VinFast 销售额增长，收入跃升，但亏损仍在扩大
item.description: 越南电动汽车制造商 VinFast Auto Ltd. 第四季度亏损扩大，原因是其全球扩张（包括计划在印度、印度尼西亚和国内建厂）相关成本上升。【原文：Vietnamese electric vehicle maker VinFast Auto Ltd.’s fourth-quarter loss widened as costs associated with its global expansion, including planned factories in India, Indonesia and domestically, rose.】

item.title: Instagram 增长理论是 Meta 反垄断审判的核心内容
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Sarah Frier 报道 Instagram 联合创始人 Kevin Systrom 在美国对 Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Sarah Frier reports on Instagram co-founder Kevin Systrom’s testimony at the US antitrust trial against Meta Platforms Inc.】
